text.text: Welcome to the third edition of Materials & You: Surviving the first day and beyond. It looks like some my Tinker's knowledge has been lost. Perhaps I'll remember more with newer versions.
This book is currently incomplete, but it contains the content that is released. It will be updated as the mod gets updated with more content!

If you are wondering about the changes in the newest version, check the "What's New" page, linked from GitHub or on the SlimeKnights Discord. Sadly I couldn't figure out links so I can't link them to you
